author: cutting
msg: Fix createNewFile() so that it creates a .crc file, like everything
else does.  This fixes some annoyances in Nutch.

author: imario
msg: For some reason it is still possible that we dont have the view which will be removed. I experienced this problem after a tomcat restart. Then tomcat might restore the session (if the browser still has the cookie) and thus out-of-date data will be loaded.
